ingredients.item: 1 bunch salad onions, cut into 1cm slices
260g pack cod fillets, cut into chunks
180g pack 2 sea bass fillets, skinned and cut into chunks
Handful of fresh basil form a large pot, roughly torn

instructions.step: Place the canned and fresh tomatoes in a large saucepan with the olives, garlic, Mediterranean seasoning and stock. Bring to
the boil and simmer for 5 minutes. Shred the cavolo nero and add with the salad onions, then cook for a further 3 minutes.
Add the fish and cook, covered, for 1-2 minutes until just cooked through, then season and add the basil. Serve with crusty bread.
